text: I can’t really tell you what goes wrong. From my experience re-deploying the project, updating the CMS page &/or restarting the dev server fixes it.

Hi Everyone,
How to use react in HubSpot cms template or modules to use in landing page in HubSpot cms ?
Can anyone suggest me a video?
<https://github.HubSpot.com/cms-react/reference/js-modules.html>
Thanks <@UBT0AHWLD>
awesome, I'm very much looking forward to trying this out
<@U0682QW2QN7> fyi

<@UBT0AHWLD>
Can we use a shadcn/ui components in HubSpot templates ?

<https://ui.shadcn.com/>

Hi Everyone,
Can we use a shadcn/ui components UI in HubSpot cms modules/templates ?

<https://ui.shadcn.com/>
<@U081PH5SETT> Sorry I don't know for sure but it's seems the answer is no

Hi, deploying our second React CMS website now but running into some issues. Most of the islands wont run on render and showing a error message resulting in layout shifts and error messages inside the DOM. In the console I can see the following:

(index):267 Error in island components/islands/BlogCarousel.tsx?client-entry Error Error: EMFILE: too many open files, open ‘/var/task/node_modules/lucide-react/dist/esm/icons/message-circle-x.js’
    at async open (node:internal/fs/promises:639:25)
    at async readFile (node:internal/fs/promises:1242:14)
    at async getSource (node:internal/modules/esm/load:46:14)
    at async defaultLoad (node:internal/modules/esm/load:137:34)
    at async ModuleLoader.load (node:internal/modules/esm/loader:555:7)
    at async ModuleLoader.moduleProvider (node:internal/modules/esm/loader:434:45)
You should ... as far as I understand how shadcn works.
ok thanks for your answer!

Suddenly my builds are failing with the following errors:
```[ERROR]
   Feb 19 5:40:50PM CET  npm error code ERESOLVE 
[ERROR]
   Feb 19 5:40:50PM CET  npm error ERESOLVE unable to resolve dependency tree 
[ERROR]
   Feb 19 5:40:50PM CET  npm error 
[ERROR]
   Feb 19 5:40:50PM CET  npm error While resolving: cms-js-renderer@1.0.1-alpha.1 
[ERROR]
   Feb 19 5:40:50PM CET  npm error Found: react@18.3.1 ```
I have not touched anything from my libraries and everything was working yesterday.

Hi, team! Have there been any recent changes to module fields?

We've had fields that were working just fine suddenly become unavailable for certain modules, even though our code did not affect them and the same code works fine in other environments. Could this be a caching issue of some sort?

(Tagging <@UAYBXDG4U> for visibility)

Thank you!
can you provide a portal id

Am I able to access the window.location.href object from cms react?
Thank you.
not on the server, that would have to be in an "island" after hydration
<https://github.HubSpot.com/cms-react/reference/islands.html>
<https://github.HubSpot.com/cms-react/appendix.html#server-side-client-side-rendering>
I see. Could I still pass them to the backend at all?
you can use <https://github.HubSpot.com/cms-react/reference/cms-components.html#usepageurl>
which is a hook that will provide the current page url on server and client.
Thank you!
That was SO much help!
